messages.content: Message: Pipe casting quality is excellent, no defects found during inspection and dimensions are always within tolerance.
{"aspects":{"product":5}}
Message: Material specs sometimes do not match the drawings and we had to return a few batches last month.
{"aspects":{"product":2}}
Message: Sales team is very responsive on WhatsApp and email, they follow up quickly on our RFQs and clarifications.
{"aspects":{"service":5}}
Message: Customer service can be defensive when we raise site issues, we feel our concerns are not fully addressed.
{"aspects":{"service":2}}
Message: Delivery is usually on time but sometimes the second truck comes much later than promised, which affects our night shift.
{"aspects":{"delivery":3}}
Message: Recent deliveries have been consistently late by two to three days, causing rework in our project schedule.
{"aspects":{"delivery":1}}
Message: Invoices are clear and always match the delivery orders, no issues with billing so far.
{"aspects":{"payment":5}}
Message: Payment terms are quite rigid and there is little flexibility when our internal approval is delayed.
{"aspects":{"payment":2}}
Message: Stock availability for standard sizes is good, we seldom face out-of-stock issues.
{"aspects":{"product":4}}
Message: We frequently encounter no stock for common items and have to wait for backorders, which affects site progress.
{"aspects":{"product":2}}
Message: The team is helpful and willing to coordinate directly with our site supervisors to sort out urgent orders.
{"aspects":{"service":4}}
Message: We sent a few emails but took a long time to get a reply on technical queries.
{"aspects":{"service":2}}
Message: Deliveries are well coordinated with our crane time and they usually update us if the truck will be late.
{"aspects":{"delivery":4}}
Message: Sometimes the delivery driver cannot find the correct gate and we waste time guiding them in.
{"aspects":{"delivery":3}}
Message: There was a big mismatch between the PO price and the invoice, took a few weeks to sort out the credit note.
{"aspects":{"payment":2}}
Message: Finance team is easy to deal with and they accommodate our internal processing timelines.
{"aspects":{"payment":4}}
Message: Casting of manhole covers is robust and passes all our load tests without issues.
{"aspects":{"product":5}}
Message: We found surface rust on some ductile iron pieces upon arrival, had to reject part of the shipment.
{"aspects":{"product":2}}
Message: Very easy to get hold of the salesperson even after office hours when we have urgent needs.
{"aspects":{"service":5}}
Message: Sometimes calls are not returned promptly and we need to chase for updates.
{"aspects":{"service":3}}
Message: Orders usually arrive earlier than planned which helps us build float into our work programme.
{"aspects":{"delivery":5}}
Message: One batch was completely missed from the delivery and only arrived after we complained.
{"aspects":{"delivery":1}}
Message: Credit terms are reasonable and match what we have with other main suppliers.
{"aspects":{"payment":4}}
Message: It is difficult to get exceptions or extensions on payment even when the delays are not within our control.
{"aspects":{"payment":2}}
Message: Product quality is okay overall but the surface finishing is not as good as competitors.
{"aspects":{"product":3}}
Message: The sales engineer knows our project requirements well and proactively suggests alternatives when items are not available.
{"aspects":{"service":5}}
Message: The service team sometimes pushes responsibility back to us instead of helping to investigate site issues.
{"aspects":{"service":2}}
Message: Delivery lead time for special items is reasonable and they keep us informed on progress.
{"aspects":{"delivery":4}}
Message: Sometimes the truck arrives without prior notice and our unloading team is not ready.
{"aspects":{"delivery":3}}
Message: We rarely have disputes over invoiced quantities, the billing is usually accurate.
{"aspects":{"payment":4}}
Message: It took a long time to process a refund when we returned some unused items.
{"aspects":{"payment":2}}
Message: Product dimensions are accurate and we have no issues fitting them on site.
{"aspects":{"product":5}}
Message: There were a few wrong sizes supplied and we had to send them back for exchange.
{"aspects":{"product":2}}
Message: The coordinator is friendly and easy to work with, they try to adjust to our site constraints.
{"aspects":{"service":4}}
Message: It sometimes feels like our smaller orders are not prioritised and we get slower responses.
{"aspects":{"service":3}}
Message: Deliveries for standard items are very fast, usually next day after we confirm the PO.
{"aspects":{"delivery":5}}
Message: A few times the driver came during restricted hours and we had to reschedule unloading.
{"aspects":{"delivery":2}}
Message: Overall we are satisfied with the product quality and the teamâ€™s responsiveness.
{"aspects":{"product":4,"service":4}}
Message: Product quality is fine but deliveries and communication are quite inconsistent.
{"aspects":{"product":3,"delivery":2,"service":2}}
Message: Service is excellent but we hope for more flexibility in payment terms as projects get tighter.
{"aspects":{"service":5,"payment":3}}
Message: Very unhappy with the late deliveries and wrong items supplied in the last few orders.
{"aspects":{"delivery":1,"product":1}}
